title: FULL SHOW: We Talk To Ari Lennox, The Cast Of "The Woman King", Talk The Queens Funeral & More
itunes:title: FULL SHOW: We Talk To Ari Lennox, The Cast Of "The Woman King", Talk The Queens Funeral & More
description:
Today on The Breakfast Club we have singer and r&b artist, Ari Lennox, on to talk her new record "Age/Sex/Location". Later we chat to the cast of "The Woman King" and talk about Viola Davis' journey to peak fitness for her role. Later on we talk about updates of The Queen Elizabeth's funeral & Charlamagne gives us todays Donkey.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
